title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Teacher Training Program on Astronomy-Integrated Language Curriculum Inquiry-Based Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level astronomy concepts and experience teaching language subjects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can design at least three inquiry-based learning modules analyzing science texts explaining astronomical phenomena from a language curriculum perspective
Participants can develop at least two project-based language learning activities using astronomical data (e.g., report writing, scientific argumentation presentations)
Participants can create at least one astronomy-language integrated assessment tool applicable across different school levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
